channel.title: [help] Pickup Command Help
channel.description: Ok well i use ObeyPk Source and when i ::pickyp 1048 1 it would d/c me and then i would log back in and not find any item help plz?

item.title: [help] Pickup Command Help
item.dc:creator: @skatelifemanager skatelifemanager
item.description:
@skatelifemanager wrote:

replace your pickup code with this
Silabs

[code]

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“you typed something wrong, try ::pickup 00995 10”);
}
} [/code]

non-silabs

[code]

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“you typed something wrong, try ::pickup 0995 10”);
}
} [/code]

home i helped

Read full topic
